books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A classic American novel set in the Jazz Age, exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A gripping tale of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about totalitarianism.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel of manners that critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A story about teenage rebellion and alienation narrated by Holden Caulfield.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first novel in the Harry Potter series, following a young wizard's journey.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy novel about the quest of home-loving Bilbo Baggins.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: A mystery thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon.
